title: Font ID
content:
Hallo,   
could anybody spot the font used in this company logo?   
 [http://www.alfaagency.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162656/http:/www.alfaagency.com/)   
   
thank you very much   
m.

author: manard

comments.content:
Flexure designed by Stephen Farrell. Sold through T-26   
( [http://66.70.183.115/fonts/fontshow/db.cgi?db=default&uid=default&ID=47&ww=on&view\_records=View+Records](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023162656/http:/66.70.183.115/fonts/fontshow/db.cgi?db=default&uid=default&ID=47&ww=on&view_records=View%2BRecords))
